captions.text: ANTWAUN DIXON: Whoo!
See my new teeth I got?
[CHUCKLE].

That's when all the
cameras come on.

And then that's when the
videos go on YouTube.

Like, that's all everybody
see, oh fight,
oh this, this, this.

That's when I'm faded, just
like, living, like doing me,

but you know what I'm saying,
just, like, whatever.

That's who I am, whatever
position I'm in.

It's always all eyes on me, but
niggas ain't got to put it
on the internet and shit.
They just--

MALE SPEAKER: You think
that that's--
ANTWAUN DIXON: --stupid

MALE SPEAKER: --a little
one-sided?

That like, doesn't
show who you are?
ANTWAUN DIXON: Why?
What do you mean?

MALE SPEAKER: Like, all that
footage, do you think that
doesn't really--
ANTWAUN DIXON: Well, no duh.

What, drunk and just fighting
and all that shit?
No, that ain't me.

MALE SPEAKER: I think a lot of
people might say that, like

the Baker thing, all the videos
and the ads, would be

promoting the destructive
behavior.
ANTWAUN DIXON: Shit.

ANDREW REYNOLDS: I just tell
the truth about how
skateboarding is.

I like "Goodfellas," but I'm not
going to go shoot somebody
and chop them up.
You know what I mean?
Whatever.

It's like, people were bent out
of shape about the tour

video because people
were doing drugs.

And that's the footage
Beagle gave me.

What am I going to do,
candy-coat it and make it not
what it really was?
Just show what it really was.

MALE SPEAKER: Do you ever worry
that Antwaun's career

could just cut short because
of going to jail?
Like, for real, jail?

LIZARD KING: Yeah, yeah,
like prison.
Like, stupid shit.

Yeah, yeah, I trip on him
all the time, man.

But, I mean, even if I said
anything to him, he wouldn't
give a fuck.

But it just sucks to think
that he has the sickest--

dude, he's the fucking best
dude on a skateboard ever.

And he fucking got caught up
in that fucking scene, you
know what I mean?

MALE SPEAKER: I'll
take aim for you.

MALE SPEAKER: Blowing his
CO dude with smoke.

MALE SPEAKER: That's
your brother?

ANTWAUN DIXON: And Beagle was
the last person that was with
me when I've seen my brother.
That's real.
ANTWAUN DIXON: My nigga.
Like for real.
Like for real.
MALE SPEAKER: Who?
Terry and your brother?
ANTWAUN DIXON: TK, yeah.

ANTWAUN DIXON: Hey, you already
know what that's
about, nigga.

ANDREW REYNOLDS: That's
what people say.

A lot of people say he looks
up to his brother a lot.

So that's like, he doesn't
look up to
someone who's doing good.

He looks up to someone who's
probably in jail for the rest
of their life.
ANTWAUN DIXON: Always.
MALE SPEAKER: Make it work.

ANTWAUN DIXON: Ain't
that real?
That real.
Hey, ain't that real?

I'm going to take
your shirt off.

title: Getting High w Pro Skater Antwuan Dixon - Epicly Later'd - 4 of 4

comments.text:
How so? He's back on his board, he's out of jail and back with Baker. 
People make fucking mistakes and people have fucking problems. There's a 
lot of pro skaters over the years who have been through the same shit 
Antuwan has gone through. Jay Adams, Dennis Martinez, Bruce Logan, Duane 
Peters, Christian Hosoi, Jeff Grosso, Eric Dressen, Jim Greco, Andrew 
Reynolds, Shane Heyl, Elissa Steamer, Dollin has mellowed out, Lizard has 
mellowed out, Ellington has mellowed out. Addiction makes you do fucked up 
shit and it puts you in fucked up places. I was a junkie. I had a bad 
heroin problem, I'm an alcoholic, I did shit I'm not proud of and I've been 
to jail several times. I'll never judge someone in Antuwans 
position...because I've been there. He's done more with his life than you 
or I ever will. The dude kills shit on a skateboard. I think having people 
like Ellington, Greco and Reynolds around will definitely help him in a lot 
of ways. Give the guy a break...he's made some fucked up decisions but he 
seems like a decent dude.

comments.author: ert loza

comments.text:
Everybody is saying like "let him live how he likes" and "it's his choice, 
he doesn't give a fuck". But honestly, like all addicts (alcohol, sex, 
gambling, whatever) he is not really in control of his life. The high 
controls him, he lives for the high. It's true that he doesn't give a fuck, 
but that's why he's an addict. Living like this ends up in the high being 
the status quo, and then it's an everyday thing, it doesn't really feel 
like anything. Then you either go harder or you quit.
It's like he desperately tries to have fun, and pushes real feelings aside. 
But when the high doesn't give him even the superficial fun anymore, he 
will realise that he is empty of real emotion and propably start to 
recover. Sadly now it seems to be more likely that he will push his actual 
feelings and reality away until the tragic end. Sorry for going all doctor 
phil, but i've been reading about this stuff.﻿

comments.author: David Suckstorff

comments.text:
so much hate in the comments. what people fail to realize is that he's just 
a kid with a fucked up background who happens to be a natural at 
skateboarding. he's obviously got a lot of issues and it doesn't help that 
everything he does ends up on the internet. there are thousands of kids 
doing the same thing antwuan does every day, without being in the 
spotlight, because they're just average kids. talent doesn't make 
everything else go away. reynolds and greco got over their addictions, but 
in some ways i think the new kids look at them and think, they had their 
fun, partying, wilding out, and they ended up OK, so I can do the same. 
problem is, reynolds and greco are exceptions to the rule, and kids don't 
recognize that. some people know how to deal with fame and money at a young 
age, and others don't. it doesn't mean that you should blame them for it if 
they can't. ﻿

comments.author: Jesus Christ

comments.text:
+Stephano Zanzin I wasn't saying that the guy didn't have previous issues 
that caused him to be this way in the beginning, but now that he has money 
he should go to rehab,and yes he like everyone has a right to do as he 
pleases as long as he isn't bothering others which he clearly does, i 
wasn't saying otherwise.Its not just the drugs and alcohol that make him a 
loser,its the complete disregard he has for those around him that he calls 
his friends and his fans and the people that have to put up with his dumb 
ignorant drunken drugged up ass including people who are just minding their 
own business and he just makes a seen by acting the fool and harassing 
people by being loud and confrontational and non civil and showing lack of 
manners or respect to the public and the law.Skateboarding is not a free 
pass to do what the fuck you want nor is any other sport,he isn't any 
better than anyone and in his case quite the contrary,he is worse,so i 
would disagree that skateboarding teaches people to do what ever they want 
considering his team mates were not in to that shit,excluding his druggy 
friends he was chilling with.  .
